授業目的: To improve presentation skills, such that participants can effectively delivery presentations with visual support, both individually and in pairs.
到達目標:
By the end of the course, learners will be better able to:

*Present ideas using a coherent structure, appropriate connecting language, and paralinguistic skills (e.g. eye contact, posture/gestures, intonation) for individual presentations
*Present ideas using a coherent structure, appropriate connecting language, and paralinguistic skills (e.g. eye contact, posture/gestures, intonation) for paired presentations
*Use visual aids (e.g. poster/ppt) to support presentation content
*use spoken interaction skills learned in semester 1 to participate in in-class discussions and class activities
*use topic specific language to effectively communicate on selected topics
特記事項: 【合併】英語IIｄ　２０（経済学部）/英語IVｂ　２０（経済学部）
授業方法: Classes will be interactive and group-work based, with some language and skills guidance from the teacher. Learners are expected to participate actively in all tasks to gain the maximum benefit to their spoken English skills. There will be a range of spoken tasks, including group discussions, presentations, supported by reading & listening tasks. Materials will include a selection from the textbook as well as additional materials distributed in class and on LUNA.

トピック.授業外学習2:
Learners will be expected to completed homework tasks from the course text to review and prepare for classes each week. A minimum of 1 hour per week should be spent on homework tasks. Homework tasks include (but are not limited to):

Pre-class reading/listening on the unit topic
Presentation and discussion preparation
Presentation and discussion written review
Vocabulary practice
Free-writing
